> M5 Walmart Challenge Data

## Installation

You can install the development version of m5 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("krzjoa/m5")
```

## Usage

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(m5)
library(zeallot)

DIR <- 'sample/directory'

# Downloading the data
m5_download(DIR)

# Loading the data
c(sales_train,
   sales_test,
   sell_prices,
   calendar) %<-% m5_get_raw_evaluation(DIR)
   
# Preparing the data
m5_data  <-
   m5_prepare(sales_train, sales_test, calendar, sell_prices)
```
